message: Ask this on http://dramaticaquery.com por favor :)

Re: http://dramatica.com/theory/theory_book/dtb_ch_9_p6.html
2nd paragraph: "Unless a character represents at least one Element, it is not fulfilling a dramatic function and is therefore being employed for storytelling only."

Does that make a character without an element a player?
All OS characters are represented by players, whether or not they fulfill dramatic functions.
